column4: hi all :)   I recently installed ubuntu 10.04, and I need help with sound (no sound coming form RhythmBox)
its a package with updated sound drivers for lucid
fyi, i am getting sound from FLV clips and the like
also... double check your mixer settings. make sure PCM and Front and Master are all up
how do I check my 'PCM settings'?
there's just one volume slider in the taskbar, and it's ful

bahh why do they remove all the useful things from gnome *sigh* ok open a terminal and run "alsamixer"and then check in there. use arrow keys to change volumes and M to mute/unmute (if a "slider" says MM at bottom, it's muted)
i increased all that I could control to 100, but still no sound
ok then install that package and reboot and see if it helps. if not...try the 10.10 RC live cd? and if that doesn't work, please file a bug from that live cd with:    ubuntu-bug -s audio
very sorry for wasting your time lol.....my headphones were already plugged in xD
